name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Golang Engineer with expertise in **Golang**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Helm**, **Python**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and cloud-native applications. Proven ability in leveraging **GPU scheduling** and **RBAC** to enhance application performance and security. Equipped with a strong foundation in developing scalable, reliable, and user-centric solutions. Recognized for successfully implementing complex solutions in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, driving significant improvements through automation, robust architecture, and a steadfast commitment to clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Golang** to develop robust microservices for a Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), optimizing performance and achieving a **95% accuracy** in patient tracking.
Implemented **Kubernetes** for orchestration of microservices, maintaining **99.9% uptime** and ensuring high availability and scalability.
Containerized applications using **Docker** to enhance deployment efficiency and facilitate seamless integration across environments.
Leveraged cloud-native strategies to streamline deployment processes, resulting in an **80% reduction** in deployment times via CI/CD pipelines.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs to integrate secure EHR systems with a focus on data accuracy, which improved reliability by **40%**.
Created and managed RBAC policies to ensure secure access and compliance across cloud environments.
Built machine learning pipelines using **Python** with frameworks such as **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**, improving data processing efficiency and model performance.
Implemented GPU scheduling strategies to optimize computational resources and reduce execution time for heavy data tasks.

Utilized **Golang** for developing high-performance backend services, enhancing system efficiency by 30%.
Implemented cloud-native practices with **Kubernetes** for orchestrating containerized applications, achieving a 35% reduction in deployment time.
Adopted **Docker** and **Helm** for streamlined application packaging and distribution, improving developer productivity by 40%.
Developed robust machine learning models using **Python**, **TensorFlow**, and **PyTorch** for data analysis, yielding an accuracy improvement of 15%.
Established **RBAC** (Role-Based Access Control) for enhanced security protocols, increasing user access management efficiency by 20%.
Executed **GPU scheduling** strategies to optimize resource allocation, resulting in a performance boost for compute-heavy applications by 25%.

Developed cloud-native applications using **Golang** ensuring seamless integration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for efficient container orchestration.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Helm** for version management and deployment strategies, reducing deployment times by **60%**.
Collaborated with data science teams leveraging **Python**, **TensorFlow**, and **PyTorch** for GPU scheduling to enhance application performance, achieving **20%** faster model training.
Enforced Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) policies to ensure secure access across applications, leading to a **50%** decrease in security incidents.
Maintained high-availability for applications with an uptime of **99.5%** through continuous monitoring and optimization.
